News.Title: Chavda Infra Secures 150 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: Chavda Infra, a company with a market capitalization of 360 crore rupees, has won a new order worth 150 crore rupees. The company operates in the SME (Small and Medium Enterprise) sector.

News.Title: Chavda Infra Secures Rs 72.75 Crore Order in Current Financial Year
News.Summary: Chavda Infra has announced that it has received an order worth Rs 72.75 crores during the current financial year. This information was reported through the SME (Small and Medium Enterprises) segment.

News.Title: Chavda Infra Secures 218.98 Crore Rupee Order
News.Summary: Chavda Infra, a company with a market capitalization of 343 crore rupees, has won a significant order worth 218.98 crore rupees. This development is particularly noteworthy for the company, which is listed in the Small and Medium Enterprise (SME) segment.
